title: Doors and Windows
details: All products of TOSTEM are developed and designed, manufactured and assembled under an integrated production process with strict TOSTEM quality control. The greatest benefit of TOSTEM’S PRE-ENGINEERED SYSTEM is the ability to build windows with consistent quality. No special tools will be needed for ASSEMBLY and INSTALLATION. Anyone can assemble the product with the same level of quality with a screw driver. Lixil is the only manufacturer that uses state-of-the-art technology TEXGUARD in aluminum surface treatment. It’s Lixil’s original technology that provides an outstanding weatherproof coating on aluminum extrusions using electrodeposition process. It offers greater color and gloss retention, stronger surface integrity which protects against scratches and corrosion and ease of cleaning due to its anti-dust technology.

title: Exterior
details: EXTERIOR PRODUCTS is a complete set of housing products which are designed and developed to compliment TOSTEM’s Aluminum doors and windows. We have GIESTA Entrance Doors, Ventilation Doors, Fence, Gate and Carports.

title: GIESTA Entrance Doors
details: GIESTA Entrance Doors are high quality wood pattern or metallic finish doors with wrapped steel panels. The insulating structure inside are designed and built to fight against extreme weather conditions and termites.

title: Shop Fronts
details: SHOPFRONTS/EZ SERIES is TOSTEM’s standard series for curtain wall stick type system which can be used for low to mid rise buildings. It has a flat design with glass set at front and hidden drain holes for the drainage system.
